modal.title: Want to get a free consultation?
modal.text: After receiving the application, our specialist will contact you

hero.title: POWERFUL INDUSTRIAL DIESEL GENERATORS ARE YOUR KEY TO RELIABLE POWER!
hero.text: Power Met International are experts in importing and installing generator systems to keep your business running smoothly.

factory.title: About us
factory.text: JV LLC POWER MET INTERNATIONAL is your reliable partner in the field of industrial diesel generators. We import and supply more than 8 leading manufacturing brands, including Shanghai, Volvo, Weichai, Baudouin, Ella, Perkins. Our range starts from 3 kVA and goes up to 2500 kVA and above. We provide complete solutions including consultation, installation, maintenance and spare parts. We cooperate with Kazakhstan, Tajikistan, Kyrgyzstan and Turkey. Provide reliable energy supply for your business with POWER MET INTERNATIONA

catalog.title: Our catalog
catalog.text: All generators are supplied in a noise-canceling case

design.title: Patented design cabin.
design.text: Soundproofing and field mounting of cabin-equipped generators ensures reliable and quiet operation of the engine, avoiding the high noise level that occurs during engine operation.

hero_catalog.title: FULL CATALOG OF ALL GENERATORS AND MANUFACTURERS
hero_catalog.text: On this page you can see all the information on the filters and also download the pdf of each generator

hero_service.title: OUR CAMPAIGN SERVICES
hero_service.text: On this page you have the opportunity to get acquainted with all the services of Power Met International

hero_about.title: About Us
hero_about.text: Our campaign provides services such as the sale and installation of generators in any assortment.

numbers.title: About our company
numbers.sub_text: Ð¡P POWER MET INTERNATIONAL LLC is your ideal partner in the service and import of industrial generators. Our company has specialized in servicing and supporting all leading brands of manufacturers for over 10 years. We are proud to cooperate with more than 8 brands of generator manufacturers and offer more than 140 models of generators that we successfully import. Quality and reliable solutions for your energy needs will keep your business running smoothly. Our experienced and professional staff guarantees high quality service and prompt deliveries. Put your worries on our shoulders and enjoy the reliability and efficiency of our generator solutions. Trust us and feel the difference - your success is our concern!
numbers.text_1: Our campaign imports over 140 models of industrial diesel generators
numbers.text_2: Our campaign cooperates with more than 8 brands - manufacturers of industrial diesel generators
numbers.text_3: Our company has been importing and installing industrial diesel generators for over 10 years

hero_partner.title: MORE THAN 7 SUPPLIERS WORK WITH US
hero_partner.text: Here you can get acquainted with each of the suppliers

part.title: Our partners
part.head: WHO DO WE WORK WITH?
part.text: Our firm is proud to partner with the best manufacturers of industrial generators. As a leading importer, our company introduces their products to the market. We strive to offer our customers only the best generators, providing a reliable and efficient power supply in various industries and areas of activity.

hero_contact.title: ALWAYS TO CONTACT US 24/7
hero_contact.text: We provide 24/7 support to our customers
